name: Gravity Shapes Beta
description:
The game above is out of date, please install properly.

THIS GAME IS IN DEVELOPMENT!!

Note: This game will only be for PC, I am thinking about making it mobile but not too sure at the moment.

Gravity Shapes is a simple game, you are a square and you need to complete the levels. Purple blocks are called Gravity blocks, they change your gravity. There is a teleporter at the end of the level, it is used to teleport to other levels and beat the game. Have fun! The map is located on the right of the page of the first level.  This is a puzzle game, you have to try to figure out what to do at some points. The demo is at the top of the screen, I'm not sure if it has the changes or not, it happens on some devices.

Gravity shapes is not out yet, this is not the demo thing which you can find here: https://coderman123.itch.io/gravity-shapes.
